divs: Sighting DetailsI have been watching this object for around 10 years. My friends also, most of the time it is west of my house. tonight it was south, real close when i noticed it. then i put cam corder on it for about 20 min. I also have others of it. sometimes it stays stationary other times moves closer then farther away other timems right & left very fast. its all on tape.Some times I will see it make note where it is in the sky, go in the house come back out and it will have moved way up to left of sky go back in the house and it will be closer and way down to the right.I usuly see it 2 or 3 times a mounth.
Summary: red white blue lights , round object pulsaits every few min.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wheeling
This sighting has never been favorited.
